changes.change:
NEW FEATURES:
-Added ability to customize long press actions. Got to settings and tap the shortcuts to assign.
-Added ability to customize colour individually

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed crash for some devices
-Significant amount of codes rewritten for better performance
-And many more minor bug fixes

NEW FEATURES:
-Added new shortcut: Auto-Correction

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed long pressing Cursor shortcuts sometimes ended up in non-stop cursor moving
-Fixed globe/dictation button being unintentionally replaced with circle image when long press is enabled
-Fixed language menu not showing up for globe/dictation in their default setting
-Fixed trackpad mode toggled DockX/Barmoji
-Shortened lengthy toast text

NEW FEATURES:
-Added options to use globe/dictation button as toggle switch for DockX/Barmoji
-Added two new shortcuts: move cursor forward/backward
-Added option to disable swipe up from space bar toggle DockX/Barmoji

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Code optimization
-Respring is now optional for changes to take effect

NEW FEATURES:
-Now compatible with barmoji!
-Swipe up from space bar, hold and finally release your finger to toggle between DockX and Barmoji. Just like how you enter app switcher.
-Added option to pick dock mode (enabling/disabling global & dictation)
-DockX will automatically conform with the selected dock mode
-Added reset to default for shortcuts
-Added option to display toast as text
-Go to setting to configure these new options.

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Increased max shortcuts to 8

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed space bar scrolling triggers random haptic feedback

NEW FEATURES:
-Now you can add unlimited shortcuts to your dock!
-Swipe Space Bar left/right to scroll!
-Added ability to configure number of shortcuts per page

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Adjusted toast dimension for lowercase and Capitalize shortcuts
-Repositioned respring button
-Better respring method
-Fixed minor scroll back issue

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed crash for operation on masked text field

NOTICE: This update requires Alderis package from Chariz

NEW FEATURES:
-You asked for it: colour customization

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed crash on long press delete shortcut
-Improved delete logic: if text is selected, fallback to normal delete operation

NEW FEATURES:
-New shortcut: Dismiss Keyboard

FIXES:
-Fixed iOS 12 minor misalignment of delete shortcut
-Fixed delete shortcut caused crash

NEW FEATURES:
-3 new shortcuts: Bold, Italic & Underline

FIXES:
-Fixed delayed copy/paste/cut/select operation
-iOS 12 should now be able to paste images

NEW FEATURES:
-Added long press gesture on Paste shortcut: select all and paste

FIXES:
-Fixed long press gesture not working on some iOS and 13.5
-Fixed potential crash when trying to select text right after dictation

NEW FEATURES:
-Show toast window!

FIXES:
-Fixed one-handed keyboard bug

NEW FEATURES:
-Now you can add/remove shortcuts!
-Added 7 new shortcuts
-Shortcuts will animate whenever a successful operation
performed

FIXES:
-Fixed one-handed keyboard bug
-Resolved flickering issue
-Removed Barmoji as conflict package for user who
intends to use it on predictive bar
-Code improvements
-Fixed potential crash
-Fixed animation when changing to and fro one-handed keyboard
